title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 16 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 16 2022
description:
Fox’s Pete Hegseth joins Clay and Buck to discuss his new book: The Battle for the American Mind. Clay and Buck’s dads join us on Friday’s show. Call the hotline now with your questions for them: 212-445-3969. Is the U.S. Open really going to ban unvaxxed Novak Djokovic? Fauci demands more money to fight covid. Is the Biden Regime smarter than a 5th grader? Jean-Pierre answer on energy doesn’t make any sense. Biden administration officials are economically illiterate, wedded to socialist climate change cult. Jean-Pierre on Biden’s covid testing “cadence.” C&B take calls to end the show.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
